original_text: So the Pharisees said to one another, “You see that you are gaining nothing. Look, the world has gone after him.”
korean_text: 바리새인들이 서로 말하되 볼지어다 너희 하는 일이 쓸 데 없다 보라 온 세상이 그를 따르는도다 하니라

sentences.original_text: So the Pharisees said to one another,
You see that you are gaining nothing.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 아무것도 얻지 못하는 것을 보지 않느냐

sentences.original_text: the world has gone after him.”
